name: Dragon Fin Soup
blurb: A  charming SNES style RPG with Roguelike elements, set in a twisted fairytale world with a cheerful, yet raging alcoholic Heroine

rewards.reward: No Reward

THE ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK	
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack
==============================
We thank you for supporting Dragon Fin Soup and want you to enjoy the fantastic ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK by our very own talented music composer Jade Leamcharaskul!  In addition we will give you a gorgeous HD WALLPAPER PACK!  Available for digital download.

DRAGON FIN SOUP THE GAME				
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access
==============================
Gratz!  You are now the proud owner of Dragon Fin Soup the GAME featuring epic tales of murder, madness and dark secrets!  In addition we will be including a sleek digital game MANUAL and access to our FORUMS to chat with the Grimm team and discuss tips, tricks and strategies with other players help you in your adventure. All previous rewards are included.

DIGITAL PLUS EDITION		
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book
==============================
Nabbing the Digital Plus Edition of Dragon Fin Soup gets you our beautifully illustrated digital ART BOOK!   You can now enjoy a behind-the-scenes view of our production art, design sketches, and our next snazzy HD WALLPAPER PACK all created by Randis Albion.   All previous rewards are included.

PET FAMILIAR - EARLY BIRD - EDITION ============================== Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet ============================== As an early backer of Dragon Fin Soup we offer a special limited tier to adopt your own PET FAMILIAR! A variety of familiars can be found and collected in Dragon Fin Soup, but this special one is chosen by you! Join us on our developer forums and vote on the kind of pet and name you would like for your adventures. All previous rewards are included.

PET FAMILIAR EDITION		
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet
==============================
Adopt your own PET FAMILIAR!  As mentioned above there are a variety of familiars that can be found and collected in Dragon Fin Soup, but this special one is chosen by you!  Join us on our developer forums and vote on the kind of pet and name you would like for your adventures.  All previous rewards are included.

ARTISAN EDITION
============================== 
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Poster (1)
============================== 
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮ 
============================== 
Here by popular demand we are introducing the Artisan Edition of Dragon Fin Soup in which we offer you an awesome 20x15 inch ART PRINT signed by our one and only Randis Albion :)  All previous rewards are included with the exception of the EXCLUSIVE PET as we need to make this tier balanced among the rest of our rewards.

GHOST EDITION
============================== 
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Add your name to the Ghost Pool + Spirit Familiar
==============================
Become a haunted specter from beyond the grave with the Ghost Edition.  Many of our enemies in game have randomly generated names.  We will add your name to the GHOST POOL.  Now you might encounter a ghost in-game with your name!  In addition you will also receive a special, cute SPIRIT FAMILIAR!  This lil fella will not come with any gameplay advantages as we do not want to be unfair for those who did not back this tier.

BLOOD RING EDITION		
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (1)
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included!▮
==============================
Want cool schwag?  Proudly display your support of Dragon Fin Soup 
with an awesome BLOOD RING (one size fits all) and a gorgeous 20x12 inch POSTER PRINT. All previous rewards are included.

EYE CANDY - EARLY BIRD - EDITION			
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + LE T-Shirt + Name in Credits
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮
==============================
As an early backer you get a special offer for this Tier!  We will be sending you a limited edition Grimm Bros team T-SHIRT (L) and three additional brilliant photo paper POSTERS signed by the Grimm Bros!  We consider you now an honorary part of the Grimm Team and you get your name listed in the game CREDITS. All previous rewards are included except where limited.

WOLF PLUSHIE EDITION
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book +  Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (1) + Wolf Plushie
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮
==============================
Grab an exclusive limited edition plushie of BIG BAD WOLF PET FAMILIAR! This cute cuddly companion will keep you company on all of your real life or gaming adventures.  All previous rewards are included except where limited.

EYE CANDY EDITION			
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + LE T-Shirt + Name in Credits
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮
==============================
Thank you for your generous support! To show our appreciation we will be sending you a limited edition Grimm Bros team T-SHIRT (L) and three additional brilliant photo paper POSTERS signed by the Grimm Bros!  We consider you now an honorary part of the Grimm Team and you get your name listed in the game CREDITS. All previous rewards are included except where limited.

CRYSTAL EDITION			
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + LE T-Shirt + Name in Credits + Name added to Monster Pool + Engraved Crystal
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮
==============================
Immortalize your name in Dragon Fin Soup. How you may ask?  First off we will add your name to our MONSTER POOL.  Now you have a chance of meeting a monster named after yourself in-game!  Then to commemorate this grand occasion we will engrave your name on a beautiful natural CRYSTAL and send it to you in a crafted wooden chest.  How awesome is that?  All previous rewards are included except where limited.

MUSIC BOX 1.0 EDITION		
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup of the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + LE T-Shirt + Name in Credits + Name added to Monster Pool + Music Box 1.0 
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮ 
==============================
Experience the wonder of listening to the main theme song of Dragon Fin Soup softly played by a limited edition ACRYLIC MUSIC BOX made in Japan. Listen to the sample in the Music Section. All previous rewards are included except where limited.

GRIMM EDITION ==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Name in Credits + Name added to Monster Pool + Grimm Caricature
============================== 
Get your very own personal GRIMM CARICATURE!  Moody, Foreboding, and Striking Awesome these personal caricatures are great as a profile pict on any social media site :)  The the Grimm Caricature is not included in any other tiers, unless specified. All previous digital rewards included!

WEAPON EDITION			
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + LE T-Shirt + Name in Credits + Name added to Monster Pool + Design a Weapon
 ============================== 
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮ ==============================
Grimm Bros is big on creative collaboration and invite you to join us for a fun design jam on our forums and Skype to DESIGN AND NAME A WEAPON!  We will guide you through the process and together explore ideas on how to craft a unique and deadly weapon.  All previous rewards are included except where limited

MAGIC RING EDITION		
============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + LE T-Shirt + Name in Credits + Name added to Monster Pool + Design a Magic Ring
============================== 
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮ ==============================
Got a cool idea for a magical item?  Excellent!   We invite you to join the Grimm team on our forums and Skype for fun collaborative design jam to DESIGN AND NAME A MAGIC RING!   We will guide you through the process and together explore ideas for the look and the name of this special item.  All previous rewards are included except where limited.

MUSIC BOX 2.0 EDITION		
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + LE T-Shirt + Name in Credits + Name added to Monster Pool + Music Box 1.0 + Music Box 2.0
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮
==============================
Presenting the next refinement in our musical rewards tiers, a limited edition WOODEN MUSIC BOX that will play a memorable music melody from Dragon Fin Soup in lovely soft chimes.  This Tier also contains the Music Box  1.0! 
To listen to a sample please see the Youtube link in the Music Section in our Kickstarter page. All previous rewards are included except where limited.

OTAKU EDITION			
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + Wolf Plushie + LE T-Shirt + Name in Credits + Name added to Monster Pool + Engraved Crystal + Soft Cover Art Book + Hand Drawn Illustration + Music Box 1.0 + Music Box 2.0 + Become a Zombie
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮
==============================
The must-have for any gamer aficionado! We proudly offer the Otaku Edition of Dragon Fin Soup which includes a limited edition soft cover ART BOOK of Dragon Fin Soup, a one-of-a-kind HAND DRAWN ILLUSTRATION signed by Randis Albion, as well as MUSIC BOX 1.0 and MUSIC BOX 2.O. Last but not least join the Grimm team for a fun collaborative design jam to create a ZOMBIE WHO LOOKS LIKE YOU!  What could be more fun that going on a mission or quest and running into your gloriously undead self!?  Includes all previous rewards except where limited plus the WOLF PLUSHIE and ENGRAVED CRYSTAL.

MATRIX EDITION		
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + Wolf Plushie + LE T-Shirt + Name in Credits + Name added to Monster Pool + Engraved Crystal + Soft Cover Art Book + Hand Drawn Illustration + Music Box 1.0 + Music Box 2.0 + Become a NPC 
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮
==============================
Celebrate the launch of our debut title Dragon Fin Soup in style!  For our Anniversary Edition you will BECOME AN IN-GAME NPC!  This new character will look like you, be named after you, and you will even get to help design a short dialogue sequence in-game!  How cool is that?  (Dialogue needs to fit in the world - No Ads!) Includes all the previous rewards except where limited plus all physical rewards from the OTAKU TIER.

MUSIC BOX 3.0 EDITION		
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + Wolf Plushie + LE T-Shirt + Name in Credits + Name added to Monster Pool + Soft Cover Art Book + Music Box 1.0 + Music Box 2.0 + Music Box 3.0
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮
==============================
Indulge in the musical splendor of ALL THREE OF OUR LIMITED EDITION DRAGON FIN SOUP MUSIC BOXES!!! This amazing collection features not only the wooden and acrylic 18 Note Sankyo Music Box but also the supurb 50 Note Sankyo Orpheus Movement Music Box for a brilliantly complex melody.  To listen to a sample please see the Youtube link in the Music Section in our Kickstarter page. Includes all previous rewards except where limited plus the ART BOOK and WOLF PUSHIE.

FINE ART EDITION			
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + Wolf Plushie + LE T-Shirt + Name in Credits + Name added to Monster Pool + Soft Cover Art Book + Hand Drawn Illustration + Oil Painting with Frame
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮
==============================
Grimm Bros is honored by your patronage and we proudly we will create for you a beautiful hand painted and framed OIL PAINTING ON CANVAS. This wonderful hand-painted work of art will look stunning in your home 
or office.  Includes all previous rewards except where limited plus the ART BOOK, WOLF PUSHIE and HAND DRAWN ILLUSTRATION.

MEGA WORKSHOP EDITION	
==============================
Dragon Fin Soup OST + HD Wallpaper Pack (2) + Dragon Fin Soup the Game + Game Manual + Forum Access + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Pet + Blood Ring + Poster (4) + Wolf Plushie + LE T-Shirt + Name added to Monster Pool + + Grimm Caricature + Engraved Crystal + LE Soft Cover Art Book + Hand Drawn Illustration + Music Box 1.0 + Music Box 2.0 + Music Box 3.0 + Oil Painting with Frame + Become a Zombie + Design a Weapon + Design a Magic Ring + Become an NPC + Special Credit in the game + Game Development Workshop + Dinner with Grimm Bros
==============================
▮ Global shipping cost included! ▮
==============================
Join Grimm Bros for a 3 day GAME DEVELOPMENT WORKSHOP!  We will share with you in-depth and advance lessons regarding Art, Design, Production, and Business Development based on our years of experience.  Afterwards we will all go out to dinner to relax and enjoy ourselves.   Hotel and Travel are not included. All previous rewards and all limited rewards are included!
